T1D-in: Ralf gets two melee attacks with his battle axe, or two ranged attacks with his handaxes.
A1D-in:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:
7 (1d8+3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
A2D-in:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.
